Filtering Demo

This is a demo of a filtering algorithm I created while working as a developer with Boston Children's Hospital's Anesthesia IT Department. This was one of the first projects I worked on as a co-op employee, within the application these filters allowed users to filter through 1,700+ entries, once a user had chosen the appropriate filters for their use case, bulk tools then allowed the user to perform actions on all remaining entries

The priority of the selected filters are displayed in the applied filters box. The filters are OR'ed together within the same filter type, and AND'ed when choosing multiple filter types. i.e. if I were to select "Bob", "David" as name filters and then select "Playstation" as an application filter, then it would display all users named "Bob" or "David" and have "Playstation" as an application.
